trait_description: When this creature Attacks an enemy with Vulnerable, it deals 100% more damage, recovers Health equal to 100% of the damage dealt, and removes this debuff.
After an enemy is afflicted with either Weak or Vulnerable, this creature afflicts them with whichever of these debuffs the target doesn't already have.
Your creatures' attacks against enemy creatures with Vulnerable cannot be Dodged and have a 50% greater chance to deal Critical damage. This trait does not stack.
Enemy creatures with Weak have 50% less Attack and cannot deal Critical damage. This trait does not stack.
After this creature is Attacked, enemies are afflicted with Vulnerable.
When this creature Attacks an enemy with Vulnerable, it deals 100% more damage. If this damage exceeds 50% of the target's Current Health, the target dies.
After this creature Attacks an enemy with both Weak and Vulnerable, it has a 35% chance to kill the target.
If all the creatures in your party are Abominations, enemies always have Weak and Vulnerable. This trait does not stack.
After your creatures manually Cast a spell, a random enemy is afflicted with a random debuff. This trait does not stack.
At the start of each enemy's turn, they have a 1% chance to be killed. This trait does not stack.
After an enemy is afflicted with a debuff, they have a 10% chance to be sent to the bottom of the Timeline. This trait does not stack.
At the start of each enemy's turn, they have a 5% chance to attack one of their allies for each debuff they have. This trait does not stack.
When your creatures would take damage from an attack or spell, they have a 5% chance to take 0 damage for each debuff they have. This trait does not stack.
Enemies' spells cost 1 more Charge for every 2 debuffs they have. This trait does not stack.
Your creatures have an independent 20% chance to Dodge attacks for each debuff the enemy has. This trait does not stack.
At the start of each enemy's turn, they have a 25% chance to be afflicted with a random debuff. This trait does not stack.
After your creatures heal an enemy, it has a 3% chance to be killed for each debuff it has. This trait does not stack.
After your creatures Dodge an attack, they counter-attack for 20% normal damage. This trait does not stack.
At the start of battle, your Alementals gains 2 random Booze Spells for each Alemental fighting on your side. This trait does not stack.
At the start of battle, this creature gains Maximum Health equal to 150% of its Defense.
After this creature is Attacked, the enemy takes damage equal to 75% of this creature's Defense.
After your creatures are Attacked, they gain 20% Defense. This trait does not stack.
After your creatures gain Defense, they gain an equal amount of Attack. This trait does not stack.
Your creatures have 40% more Defense. This trait does not stack.
After this creature Casts a spell, your creatures gain 15% Defense.
Your creatures deal additional damage with attacks equal to 30% of their Defense. This trait does not stack.
At the start of battle, your Amaranths share 15% of their Defense with each other. This trait does not stack.
Your creatures Attack 1 additional time, but all their attacks deal 30% less damage. This trait does not stack.
Your creatures Cast spells 1 additional time, but all their spells are 30% less potent. This trait does not stack.
After your creatures gain stats, they gain these stats an additional time, but they gain 50% fewer stats. This trait does not stack.
After your creatures are healed, they are healed an additional time, but they receive 50% less healing from all sources. This trait does not stack.
After your creatures gain a buff, they gain an additional random buff, but their buffs only last for 1 turn. This trait does not stack.
After your creatures apply a debuff, they apply an additional random debuff, but their debuffs only last for 1 turn. This trait does not stack.
If all the creatures in your party are Amphisbaenas, their innate traits' repsective effects activate 1 additional time. This trait does not stack.
This creature's attacks deal 75% more damage and grant this creature Shelled.
This creature's attacks deal 75% more damage and afflict the target with Weak.

This creature's attacks deal 75% more damage. After this creature Attacks, it gains a copy of the target's trait.
When one of your creatures dies, each of their non-Ethereal Spell Gems has a 20% chance to be Cast.

At the start of this creature's turn, deal damage to all enemies equal to 0.5% of their Current Health for every 1% of Health this creature is missing.
The damage cannot exceed 25% of each creatures' Current Health.

This creature has 15% more Attack and Intelligence for each dead creature on your side, and 15% more Defense and Speed for each living creature on your side.

Your creatures always have Agile. In addition, this creature has an independent 50% chance to Dodge attacks.
After this creature Dodges an attack, it Casts one of its spells. In addition, this creature has an independent 50% chance to Dodge attacks.

When it does, your Aspects gain 20% Attack, Intelligence, Defense, and Speed.

After this creature Dodges an attack, it Attacks the enemy. In addition, this creature has an independent 50% chance to Dodge attacks.

After this creature Dodges an attack, it gains a Barrier that absorbs damage equal to 50% of its Speed.

Your creatures can equip all Spell Gems, regardless of their class.

At the start of this creature's turn, it Casts Snowstorm. After your creatures Attack a Frozen enemy, they Cast Shatter on it. This trait does not stack.

At the start of your other creatures' turns, this creature performs an action depending on that creature's class. 
Chaos - Attack a random enemy.
Death - Enemies are afflicted with a random debuff.
Life - Your creatures gain a random buff.
Nature - Your creatures gain 10% stats.
Sorcery - Cast one of this creature's Spell Gems.

After your creatures take damage from an attack or spell, they Cast a Scourge spell on the enemy.
The type of Scourge spell is based on the enemy's class. This trait does not stack.
Enemies always have Poisoned, Blighted, Leeching, and Mending. In addition, enemies cannot be immune to Blighted.
After your creatures Attack, they reduce the target's Maximum Health by the same amount of damage dealt. This trait does not stack.

Your creatures deal 40% more damage and take 10% less damage for each turn they've taken in the current battle.

At the start of battle, your creatures that belong to this creature's class share their innate traits with each other. This trait does not stack.
At the end of your creatures' turns, they Defend. Your creatures take 90% less damage while they're Defending. This trait does not stack.
At the end of each enemy's turn, this creature deals damage to it equal to 40% of this creature's highest stat.
This creature takes 95% less damage while its allies are alive.

AT THE END OF YOUR CREATURES' TURNS, THEY'LL SAY A LOT OF !@#$ED UP !@#$ TO THE ENEMIES. SINCE YOUR ENEMIES HAVE THE EMOTIONAL
FORTITUDE OF A PIKACHU, THEY'LL CRY LIKE A BUNCH OF !@#$%ES AND DEAL 90% LESS DAMAGE.
THIS TRAIT DOES NOT STACK, WHATEVER THE !@#$ THAT MEANS.
